text: @seanhannity F*CK YOU, Sean Hannity. Trump & Fox News repeatedly claimed that this virus was no big deal, did NOTHING to let people know how serious this is, etc. Not one single Republican Congressman/woman said a damned thing about Coronavirus neither, back in November or December.
